Name: TC_ADDCART_001
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-Dashboard opened
Objective: To verify that the user can add a product to the cart successfully
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the all items page
Click to the add cart button for a product
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The selected product added to the cart successfully
The cart icon updates to reflect the added product quantity

Name: TC_ADDCART_002
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-Dashboard opened
Objective:
To verify that the product name and description remain correct after adding 
the product to the cart
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the all items page

Note the product name and description for a selected product on the 
products page for later comparison
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The product name and description are displayed correctly and match the 
selected product

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to add to cart button for the selected product
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The product is added to the cart and the cart icon updates the item 
quantity

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the cart icon open the cart page
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The cart page displayed successfully and shows the correct product name and 
description matching the selected product
